titleStmt.title: The history of Venice ... written originally in Italian by Paulo Paruta ... ; likewise the wars of Cyprus, by the same authour, wherein the famous sieges of Nicossia, and Famagosta, and Battel of Lepanto are contained ; made English by Henry, Earl of Monmouth.
Historia vinetiana. English
titleStmt.author: Paruta, Paolo, 1540-1598.
Monmouth, Henry Carey, Earl of, 1596-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Abel Rober, and Henry Herringman ...,
